sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { getUserReviews } from '../.././actions/reviews/reviews' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const ReviewCard = ({ review, currentUserId, ownProps, getUserReviews }) => { return ( review ? {review.attributes.user.username}'s review of {review.attributes.concert.name} Performance: {review.attributes.set_score} Venue: {review.attributes.venue_score} Sound: {review.attributes.sound_score} Set: {review.attributes.set_score} Price:{review.attributes.price} {review.attributes.write_up} Final Score: {review.attributes.final_score} {review.attributes.user.id == currentUserId ? : ""}
See all of {review.attributes.user.username}'s reviews : Maaaaan they ain't no review here ) } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => { const currentUserId = state.currentUser ? state.currentUser.id : "" return ({ currentUserId, }) } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, {getUserReviews})(ReviewCard))
